thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie
thread.title: Jack --

author: Jack --
title: Jack --
text:
First of all Boxymo is very cheap for young drivers. I wouldn't have been able to afford insurance with any of the other companies so I was sort of forced to take out insurance with them. They did cancel my first policy because I didn't sign the direct debit form within 30 days which was pretty annoying. I took out another policy after and I don't have any complaints. 8000Km a year was plenty for me and I get about between 50 and 150 bonus KM's per month.
Overall I think the reviews here are a bit harsh and I actually would recommend them.
